interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: VILLATONE Large Makeup Mirror with Lights and Magnification (Detachable Spot 10X Cosmetic Mirror). 360° Rotation. Touch Screen Brightness Dimming. Lighted Vanity Mirror for Make Up with LED Lighting Review Date: 2020/01/15 Store: VILLATONE Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'VILLATONE', 'Shape': 'Rectangular, Round', 'Frame Material': 'Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Mounting Type': 'Countertop Mount, Tabletop Mount', 'Special Feature': 'magnifying, dimmable, lighted', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 6 x 1 inches; 1.21 Pounds'} Review Text: This is the correct size, maneuverable, and sheds enough light to put on your makeup.
I didn’t receive the usb cord that was supposed to come with it, so I’ve had to use batteries, but that works as well. Review Title: It’s bright 💁🏻‍♀️ Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Banana Comb Hair Clips - Set of 4 Locking Clasp Hairclips The Paragon {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 2.6 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} These work only if one has fine hair. I have shoulder length, really thick hair, and the first time I tried one of them, it totally broke in half. So now thy’ll go in the “X-Mas Socking Stuffer” bag. Too Frail New Look - The Fay Farm's Organic Healing Hemp Lotion - 8 oz. The Fay Farm, LLC {'Brand': 'The Fay Farm, LLC', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '8 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.5 x 2.5 x 5.75 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '853618002405'} I’ve had severe back aches for about 3 years now-sometimes where my back freezes up and I can’t even stand up. I’m sick of pills,so when I came upon this lotion, it was really amazing. I didn’t realize what it was advertised for, so I just thought it’s for relieving pain. My “mistake” ended up freeing me of muscle pain and back cramps. It smells great too (like lavender, even though there’s none in it).
It’s like a masseus in a bottle. Great for Muscle Aches Soft & Dri Womens Soft scent Antiperspirant 3.5 fl oz/ 102g (Pack of 3) Soft & Dri {'Brand': 'Soft & Dri', 'Unit Count': '3.5 Ounce', 'Item Volume': '3.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.5 x 1.9 inches; 10.4 Ounces'} I’ve been using this product since 1978, and I was totally bummed out when it was removed off the shelves.
It really keeps you dry, and smells so good.
I’m just glad to be able to buy it here. Great 👍🏻 VILLATONE Large Makeup Mirror with Lights and Magnification (Detachable Spot 10X Cosmetic Mirror). 360° Rotation. Touch Screen Brightness Dimming. Lighted Vanity Mirror for Make Up with LED Lighting VILLATONE {'Brand': 'VILLATONE', 'Shape': 'Rectangular, Round', 'Frame Material': 'Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Mounting Type': 'Countertop Mount, Tabletop Mount', 'Special Feature': 'magnifying, dimmable, lighted', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 6 x 1 inches; 1.21 Pounds'} This is the correct size, maneuverable, and sheds enough light to put on your makeup.
I didn’t receive the usb cord that was supposed to come with it, so I’ve had to use batteries, but that works as well. It’s bright 💁🏻‍♀️
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus**: The user has thick shoulder-length hair and seeks durable hair accessories suitable for their hair type.
- **Product Durability Concern**: They value quality and robustness in hair products, with a negative perception of items seen as frail or easily breakable.
- **Gift Consideration**: There's a tendency to repurpose unsatisfactory products as thoughtful gifts, indicating a considerate approach to gifting.
- **Rating Tolerance**: Their critical eye is evident in reviewing products, with an average rating reflective of durability concerns and performance expectations.
- **Review Behavior**: They actively detail their experiences with products, particularly regarding effectiveness and user satisfaction, aiming to inform potential buyers.
- **Wellness Product Interest**: The user recently showed interest in wellness products addressing muscle pain, favoring high-rated items that provide therapeutic benefits.
- **Personal Care Products Insight**: Strong loyalty to reliable personal care products is noted, with positive reviews on items that enhance daily comfort and hygiene. The disappointment with a discontinued favorite highlights the importance of effective and pleasant-scented solutions.
- **Makeup Accessories**: Their recent purchase of a lighted vanity mirror reflects an interest in functionality and brightness for makeup application, demonstrating an appreciation for practical beauty tools, despite a minor issue with item completeness.

Overall, the user prioritizes durability and functionality in both hair and personal care products while remaining discerning about quality and performance.
